articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Message of Greeting to Russian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Message of Greeting to Russian President
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, president of the Russian Federation, on its national day.
					 Extending warm greetings to the Russian president and people on its national day, he expressed belief that the DPRK-Russia relations of friendship and cooperation with long history would continue to develop on good terms in the spirit of the joint documents adopted at the highest level and in the interests of the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 He wished the Russian president success in his responsible work for protecting the interests of Russia and stability and development of the country and the Russian people wellbeing and prosperity.

articles.title: Russian Embassy Officials Lay Wreath before Liberation Tower
articles.content:
Russian Embassy Officials Lay Wreath before Liberation Tower
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the Russian embassy here laid a wreath before the Liberation Tower on Sunday to mark the national day of Russia.
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 After a wreath was laid in the name of the Russian embassy, the participants paid silent tribute to the fallen fighters of the Soviet Army.
					
					 Staff members of the Russian embassy also laid a wreath and bouquets before the cemetery of fallen fighters of the Soviet Army in Sadong District, Pyongyang.
					
					 Meanwhile, members of the Russian consulate general in Chongjin City laid wreaths before the Liberation Tower and the cemetery of fallen fighters of the Soviet Army in the city on the same day.

articles.title: Kim Chol Ju, Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Fighter
articles.content:
Kim Chol Ju, Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Fighter
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Today marks the centenary of the birth of Kim Chol Ju, an indomitable revolutionary fighter who sacrificed himself for the implementation of the idea and line of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Kim Chol Ju had been intensely loyal to Kim Il Sung in the period when the cause of Juche revolution was started.
					
					 At that time Kim Il Sung stressed the need for the Korean children to turn out in the struggle to liberate the country from the Japanese imperialist aggressors.
					
					 As a core member of the Saenal Children's Union, the first juvenile revolutionary organization in Korea, he made all his efforts to enlightening the popular masses through art activities and publishing newspaper Saenal (new day).
					
					 Active as a secretary of a district committee of the Young Communist League, he worked hard to persuade the Chinese anti-Japanese nationalist units to form alliance with the Anti-Japanese People's Guerilla Army led by Kim Il Sung in the armed struggle against the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 Kim Chol Ju died a heroic death in a battle with enemies in an area near Chechangzi at the age of nineteen.
					
					 Though he passed away, he is always with all the servicepersons and people of the DPRK, inspiring them to perform great feats in the struggle for building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Struggle for Integration of Science and Technology with Economy
articles.content:
Struggle for Integration of Science and Technology with Economy
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Members of the February 17 Shock Brigade of Scientists and Technicians, active in different parts of the DPRK, have striven to settle the sci-tech problems arising in speeding up the integration of science and technology with the economy.
					 Those members at the Pukchang Thermal Power Complex laid a steady foundation for boosting the electricity production by solving the technical problems to stabilize the feed-water pump system and developing new additives for coal combustion.
					
					 Those at the Chonsong Youth Coal Mine developed a new type of high-performance inertia reloader and established a multipurpose telecommunications system in pits while working hard for the overall mechanization of underground work and diversification of carriage.
					
					 In the meantime, a rapid progress was registered in the work to make the country's railways heavy-duty and realize the local production of accessories needed for new types of modern machinery.
					
					 The shock brigade members active at the Forest General Bureau under the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection developed a system for making real-time estimation of the country's forest distribution and area.
					
					 Similar successes were also made in the field of urban management.

articles.title: Minju Joson Denounces S. Korea for Tightening Military Nexus with U.S. and Japan
articles.content:
Minju Joson Denounces S. Korea for Tightening Military Nexus with U.S. and Japan
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- During the recent 2016 Asia Security Conference the south Korean authorities separately met those of the U.S. and Japan and held confabs over the issue of "thoroughly enforcing sanctions against the north and maintaining close mutual cooperation," claiming that the fourth nuclear test of the DPRK and its missile launch were "violation" of the UNSC's "resolutions."
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Sunday says:
					
					 This is nothing but the reckless and desperate effort of confrontation maniacs and warmongers to stifle the DPRK at any cost with the backing of their masters U.S. and Japan, much upset by the daily rising dignity and might of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S., Japan and south Korean puppet forces are the arch criminals who have persistently disturbed peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world. It is preposterous, therefore, for them to have taken issue with the legitimate right for self-defence of the DPRK to protect sovereignty of the country and the right of the nation to existence at the above-said confabs.
					
					 What matters is that the south Korean puppet forces have rolled up their sleeves to cook up the U.S.-Japan-south Korea triangular military alliance at the prodding of the U.S.
					
					 At the above-said huddles the south Korean military warmongers promised before the U.S. master to escalate new hostile acts against the DPRK, vociferating about "unification by prevailing over communism" through northward invasion together with the Japanese reactionaries who are making desperate efforts to realize the old dream for "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere" under the pretext of coping with the DPRK's righteous measure for self-defence. These reckless moves of the south Korean military warmongers go to prove that what alarming phase their wild ambition for confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north have reached.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will never remain a passive onlooker to the moves of the south Korean authorities to ignite a nuclear war on this land by tightening the despicable collusion and nexus with their masters U.S. and Japan, talking about "military diplomacy."

articles.title: DPRK Will Invariably Keep to Road of Independence, Songun, Socialism: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Invariably Keep to Road of Independence, Songun, Socialism: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The DPRK will invariably advance straight along the road of independence, Songun and socialism, no matter how frequently the international situation and relations with neighboring countries may change, and play a vanguard role in the struggle for global independence by developing in depth the undying feats of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) which has championed independence and justice, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 Independence guarantees dignity and lifeline of the country and the nation.
					
					 It is truth that maintaining the stand of independence leads to victory and failing to do so means ruin.
					
					 Independence means the consistent revolutionary method and practice of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The road of Songun is the only way of fully demonstrating the might of the Juche idea and accomplishing the cause of the Juche revolution started in Mt. Paektu. This is the truth grasped by the service personnel and people of the DPRK through their struggle. 
					
					 It is a hard reality that one can neither beat imperialism nor defend the party and state nor protect the security of the people if one lacks one's own strength, strong military capability for self-defence.
					
					 Arms of revolution can guarantee peace and prosperity of the country and nation. This truth of revolution can never change as long as imperialism exists on the earth.
					
					 Korean socialism is Juche-type socialism which achieves development and prosperity of the country and nation on the principle of national independence. Socialism of Juche is an eternal cradle of the Korean people.
					
					 Independent world means the one free from domination, subjugation, aggression and interference and the one which ensures sovereignty and equal rights of all countries and nations. 
					
					 Only when the world becomes independent can the desire of mankind to live in a prosperous world come true.
					
					 The WPK will not retreat even a step from the road of defending independence and justice in any adversity but wage a more dynamic struggle on this path.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Abandon Daydream of "Forcing North to Dismantle Its Nukes"
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Abandon Daydream of "Forcing North to Dismantle Its Nukes"
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Mandarins of the south Korean puppet Foreign Ministry recently visited the headquarters of the European Union to implore it to "sustain harsh sanctions and pressure on the north" so that it may "change its nuclear strategy." They flew to Japan to beg for "strict enforcement of sanctions against the north." Foreign Minister Yun Pyong Se blustered that his upcoming foreign tour would provide an occasion of giving momentum to "the diplomacy for pressurizing the north."
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK are not so feeble-minded as to abandon their faith and choice, deterred by any "sanctions and pressure." The south Korean puppet authorities are stupid enough to calculate they can seek "the north's dismantlement of nukes" while talking about "change," still failing to properly understand the steadfast will and stand of the DPRK.
					
					 They would be well advised to mind its own business as they are facing a total bankruptcy before ridiculously trying to seek the north's "changes" through pressure.
					
					 They should bear in mind that no matter how frequently they stage charades to isolate and stifle the DPRK in collusion with outside forces, they will only invite the nation's curse and condemnation and international shame.
					
					 If they persist in their anachronistic confrontation with the DPRK, they will face the same severe punishment by the angry Koreans and meet the same miserable end as what their predecessors did.
					
					 Their daydream would throw them into a bottomless pitfall and precipitate their self-destruction.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Calls for Carrying forward Spirit of June Resistance
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Calls for Carrying forward Spirit of June Resistance
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty in south Korea issued an appeal titled "Let us defend democracy by carrying forward the spirit of June" on June 10. 
					 The appeal said that it is 29 years since the June resistance took place in 1987.
					
					 Many people carried on the struggle for democracy, but the "yusin" dictatorship was revived on this land and the democracy has faced a crisis, the appeal said, adding:
					
					 The people punished the Park Geun Hye's dictatorship in the April 13 general election and the twentieth-term "National Assembly" should keep in mind the people's sentiment.
					
					 The NA should give priority to solving the following problems:
					
					 First, the 20th-term NA should opt for the revision of a special law for the ferry Sewol.
					
					 Second, it should abrogate the state-compiled textbooks.
					
					 Third, it should check the retrogressive revision of labor law of the Park "government".
					
					 Fourth, it should nullify the "agreement" on sexual slavery which tolerates the rebirth of Japan's militarism.
					
					 Fifth, it should nullify the "anti-terrorism law", the law of having people under surveillance.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Forced Dismissal Protested
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Forced Dismissal Protested
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The Joint Measure Committee of Public Sector Trade Unions of the Ryangdae Rochong held a press conference in Seoul to protest against the puppet government's forced dismissal of workers on June 7, according to the south Korean newspaper Nodong and Segye. It consists of the Public Transport and Service Trade Union and the Public Health and Medical Trade Union under the Confederation of Trade Unions and the Public Workers' Union and Finance Trade Union under the Federation of Trade Unions.
					 Speakers at the press conference said that all the ministries and agencies of the "government" illegally passed through the council the proposal for the introduction of unpopular labor system without an assent with the trade unions.
					
					 They declared that they would launch legal struggle against the illegal act of the "government" abusing power.
					
					 They urged the Park Geun Hye regime to listen to the angry voices of workers, though belatedly.
					
					 They warned that the public and financial workers would go into a large-scale general strike if the authorities do not stop the misruling.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Organization of DR Congo on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Organization of DR Congo on Its Website
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The full text of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Become Pillars Supporting a Prosperous Future Korea" was posted by the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo on its website on June 7.
					 Kim Jong Un made a congratulatory speech at the joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) organizations on June 6, Juche 101 (2012) in celebration of the 66th founding anniversary of the KCU. In the speech he expressed his firm will to invariably carry forward the noble outlook of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on the future and the rising generation.
					
					 He also indicated the tasks and ways to bring up the KCU members to be knowledgeable, virtuous and healthy reserve forces who are responsible for the future destiny of the country and the nation.

articles.title: Russian Body Introduces Birthday of KCU
articles.content:
Russian Body Introduces Birthday of KCU
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The Rostov Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia posted an article titled "Congratulations on June 6" on its website on June 6 illustrated with a photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un finding himself among members of the Korean Children's Union (KCU).
					 The article said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un, leader of the DPRK, loves the children most.
					
					 His passionate love for the rising generation has deeply impressed the international community.
					
					 In June 2012, the 66th founding anniversary of the KCU was celebrated with splendor in Pyongyang.
					
					 Kim Jong Un attended the celebration.
					
					 He, wearing a KCU red necktie, made a congratulatory speech.
					
					 He spared a precious time for the children and had a photo session with them.
					
					 World media said: Audience has seen on not a few occasions Koreans extending hearty congratulations to their leader in warm tears but it is really shocking to watch even children breaking into such warm cheers. It is only the DPRK in the world that grandly celebrates children's holiday as a jubilee of the nation.
					
					 Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, is filled with joy this year which marks the 70th founding anniversary of the KCU.

articles.title: Collection of Kim Jong Un's Works Published in Russia
articles.content:
Collection of Kim Jong Un's Works Published in Russia
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- A collection of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's works was published in Russia.
					 More than 20 works of Kim Jong Un including "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" and "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" were carried.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place in the Pravda in Moscow on June 7.

articles.title: Indian Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
articles.content:
Indian Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- An Indian preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was formed in New Delhi on June 7.
					 Atle Ranjan, secretary of the National Council of the Communist Party of India, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.

articles.title: Indian Body Denounces S. Korean Authorities' Unethical Crime
articles.content:
Indian Body Denounces S. Korean Authorities' Unethical Crime
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association made public a statement on June 7 denouncing the south Korean puppet forces for alluring and abducting a group of citizens  of the DPRK. 
					 The statement urged the UN high commissioner for Human Rights and the president of the UN Human Rights Council to take measures to make the south Korean authorities immediately send back the women of the DPRK whom they took to south Korea after alluring and abducting them in daylight in Ningbo, Zhejiang Province, China early in April.
					
					 It continued:
					
					 We hold that the south Korean authorities should take immediate practical measures to enable the parents of the daughters to go to Seoul for face-to-face meeting with them.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are simply repeating the assertion about "their voluntary defection from the north" while blocking abductees' interview with media. This behavior is an unethical act of infringing upon the elementary right stipulated in the World Declaration on Human Rights and relevant international human rights convention.
					
					 We demand the UN and international human rights bodies call into question the south Korean authorities' unethical crime and take measures for sending the abductees back home as early as possible.

articles.title: Indian Public Figure Praises Korean People for Advancing under Banner of Socialism
articles.content:
Indian Public Figure Praises Korean People for Advancing under Banner of Socialism
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are advancing under the uplifted banner of socialism despite the imperialists' vicious moves to stifle the DPRK.
					 Suneet Chopra, secretary general of the All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association, said this in a speech made at an inaugural ceremony of the Indian national preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu held in New Delhi on June 7.
					
					 The year 2017 will be a significant year which will mark the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il and the 5th anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's election to the top posts of the party and state of the DPRK, the sectary general noted, and went on:
					
					 The Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) was successfully held recently.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people, led to victory the 70-day campaign for successfully greeting the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 It is our bounden duty to support the Korean people in their just struggle for building a socialist power and achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 Let us rev up the festive atmosphere of the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu through diverse activities!

articles.title: Joint Seminar Congratulating Successful Seventh Congress of WPK Held in Nepal
articles.content:
Joint Seminar Congratulating Successful Seventh Congress of WPK Held in Nepal
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- A joint seminar took place in Nepal on June 7 congratulating the successful Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present there were the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist) who doubles as deputy prime minister and minister for Women, Children and Social Welfare, the chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association, the chairman of the Study Forum for Self-Reliance of Nepal and other personages of political parties, organizations and Juche idea study organizations and masses.
					
					 The speakers said that supreme leader Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the WPK marked an important event in accomplishing the cause of global independence.
					
					 They expressed full support to the tasks set forth by Kim Jong Un at the Seventh Congress of the WPK for the drive to build a socialist power, reunify the country independently and achieve global independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Presidente ruso
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Presidente ruso
Pyongyang, 12 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea envio el dia 12 un mensaje de felicitacion a Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, Presidente de la Federacion Rusa.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					Con motivo de la fiesta nacional de la Federacion Rusa, hago llegar a Vd. y a su pueblo el saludo de cordial felicitacion.
					
					Estoy convencido de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la RPDC y la FR con larga historia seguiran desarrollandose favorablemente conforme al espiritu de los documentos comunes aprobados en el nivel supremo y los intereses de los pueblos de ambos paises.
					
					Le deseo a usted los exitos en sus trabajos responsables para defender los intereses de Rusia y lograr la estabilidad y el desarrollo del pais y a su pueblo el bienestar y la prosperidad.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia complicidad militar de titeres surcoreanos con EE.UU. y Japon
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia complicidad militar de titeres surcoreanos con EE.UU. y Japon
Pyongyang, 12 de junio (ACNC) -- Durante la "reunion de seguridad de Asia de 2016" convocada hace poco, los titeres surcoreanos urdieron un complot por separado junto con los tipejos de Estados Unidos y Japon, bajo el objetivo de "practicar estrictamente la sancion anti-Norte" y "estrechar la cooperacion" diciendo que la cuarta prueba nuclear y el lanzamiento de misil de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea "violan la resolucion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU y la ley internacional.
					Esto constituye la locura desesperada de los maniacos conflictivos y belicistas encaminada a aplastar a toda costa a la RPDC bajo el amparo de los amos norteamericano y japones, inquietados por la mas elevada dignidad y poderio de la RPDC.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido el dia 12 y prosigue:
					
					Los autores que han violado y destruido constantemente la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana, la region del Noreste de Asia y el resto del mundo, cuestionan absurdamente el justo derecho autodefensivo de la RPDC para defender la soberania del pais y el derecho a vivir de la nacion.
					
					Lo mas problematico es que los titeres surcoreanos se entregan a las maniobras por inventar la alianza militar tripartita EE.UU.-Japon-Sur de Corea bajo la instigacion del imperio.
					
					Los belicistas de la capa militar del Sur de Corea juraron intensificar mas nuevo acto hostil anti-RPDC ante su amo gringo abogando por la "unificacion basada en la victoria sobre el comunismo" a traves de la agresion al Norte de Corea junto con los reaccionarios japoneses que actuan desesperadamente por realizar el viejo sueno de la "esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia Oriental" cuestionando nuestra justa medida autodefensiva. Todo esto demuestra hasta donde ha llegado la ambicion de confrontacion fratricida de los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias nunca estaran con los brazos cruzados ante el intento de los titeres surcoreanos de fortalecer la confabulacion sucia con los amos estadounidense y japones preconizando la "diplomacia militar" y traer el nubarron de fuego de la guerra nuclear en esta tierra patria.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun demanda a Sur de Corea abandonar ilusion de "renuncia nuclear de Norte"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun demanda a Sur de Corea abandonar ilusion de "renuncia nuclear de Norte"
Pyongyang, 12 de junio (ACNC) -- Hace poco, los compinches del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores titere del Sur de Corea visitaron la sede de la Union Europea para solicitar el "mantenimiento de la fuerte sancion y presion anti-Norte de Corea" para inducir el "cambio de estrategia nuclear" de alguien. Y en Japon mendigaron la "aplicacion de las rigurosas medidas de sancion anti-Norte". El canciller Yun Pyong Se dijo que su proxima gira al extranjero sera un motivo para consolidar la "diplomacia de presion anti-Norte".
					El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un comentario individual del dia 12, senala que el ejercito y pueblo coreanos no abandonaran su conviccion ni cambiaran su opcion arrodillados ante la "sancion y presion" de las fuerzas hostiles, y continua:
					
					Es un proceder ridiculo que las autoridades surcoreanas abrigan todavia la ilusion vana de lograr la "renuncia nuclear del Norte" persiguiendo el "cambio" de la RPDC sin darse clara cuenta de la ferrea voluntad y posicion de la parte connacional. 
					
					Los conservadores surcoreanos deben salvar primero la crisis de su gobernacion, antes de perseguir el "cambio" de alguien. 
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben tener presente que la campana intrigante anti-RPDC en confabulacion con las fuerzas extranjeras producira solo el repudio y rechazo de la nacion y la verguenza internacional. 
					
					Si los titeres surcoreanos siguen recurriendo a la anacronica campana de enfrentamiento anti-RPDC, recibiran el castigo severo de todos los coreanos indignados, al igual que sus antecesores. 
					
					La ilusion vana de las autoridades surcoreanas les llevara al abismo sin salida y acelerara su autodestruccion.
